        Returns:
        The z-score.

        Calculate a z-score with a non-standard distribution.
        Parameters:
        x - The x value (value on distribution).
        mean - The mean of the distribution.
        stdDev - The standard deviation of the distribution.
        Returns:
        The z-score.

      • x2Test

                            double[] expected)
                     throws MException

        Parameters:
        observed - The observed values.
        expected - The expected values.
        Returns:
        The chi-squared test statistic.
        Throws:
        MException - Thrown if observed.length != expected.length.
